Package org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.util

Class RepositorySession

java.lang.Object
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.util.RepositorySession
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class RepositorySession extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Auto-managed JCR session with fluent assertions for repository operations. Implements AutoCloseable for automatic session cleanup. Reduces repository access boilerplate from 7-9 lines to a single fluent chain.

Example usage: 

 try (RepositorySession repo = RepositorySession.forRepository(repository)) {
     repo.assertNodeExists("/hst:myproject")
         .getNode("/hst:myproject")
             .assertPrimaryType("hst:hst");
 }
